description: FFmpegSource2 creates FFINDEX files by default when media files are indexed. You can disable the default behavior if you don't want these files to be created.
FFmpegSource2 is also available as a plugin for the program Avisynth and creates FFINDEX files in the same manner.

common_filenames.description: [Source File Name].ffindex - Default name FFmpegSource2 gives to index files.
[Source File Name].ffindex - Default name FFmpegSource2 gives to index files.
